commentaries.bbcode: [b]Six![/b] Here is Gayle! He leans back and toes the drive 79 meters over mid off

message.text: Six! Here is Gayle! He leans back and toes the drive 79 meters over mid off

commentaries.bbcode: Four! Oh yes! Elegance from Gayle! Yes elegance! He sits on the backfoot, clears his front leg and opens his hands on a punch through extra cover

tweetjson.text: There aren't too many bowlers that are affective at the top & the end of the innings. BUT @mstarc56 is in a league of his own #RCB #PepsiIPL

user.name: Lisa Sthalekar
user.description: Former NSW and Australian Cricketer. Cricket commentator and specialist Coach. Love movies, a glass of wine & a tragic netball supporter. These views are my own

message.text:
There aren't too many bowlers that are affective at the top & the end of the innings. BUT @mstarc56 is in a league of his own #RCB #PepsiIPL

— Lisa Sthalekar (@sthalekar93) April 26, 2015
